content.title:
SØMNS :
The Golden 5 Minutes
content.subtitle: Master the art of the evening wind-down through curated ritual and sensory depth.

content.heading:
We don’t fail to sleep.
 We fail to let the day end.
content.text:
Tonight’s problem isn’t energy.
It’s attention that never shuts off.

We’re not awake.
We’re still switched on.

content.heading:
Not a sleep product.
 It’s a permission to slow down.
content.text:
You don’t buy this
 to sleep better.
You buy it
 to stop scrolling,
 stop pushing,
 and start ending the day gently.

content.heading:
For people who are tired,
 and still trying.
content.text:
For those who give their mind, their heart, and their energy all day long.

Tired — but still planning what comes next.

We don’t help you sleep.
We help you close the day gently.
